prompt: [return only the JSON object like [{...}]. remove all non-white spaces, pre-text and post-text] Generate exactly <item count here> items about '<category here>', as the 'word', letters used in 'word' should only composed from English alphabet, maximum of 40 letters, provide maximum of 20 word description, definition (or fun facts) as the 'info', provide translations if possible, do not include the word used in 'word' for '<category here>'. Format using valid JSON format with these properties: id: <unique number>, word: <word here>, info: <definitions here>. (Do not name the JSON object when you create it).
